name: Introduction to African American Literature
description: This course introduces students to the broad survey of African American literature from the 19th century to the present.

name: African American Literature to 1900
description: This course examines African American literature from the 19th century to the turn of the 20th century.

name: Survey of Modern African American Literature
description: This course provides an overview of the major genres and authors in African American literature since 1900.

name: African American Literature and Poetry
description: This course examines African American literature from both historical and contemporary perspectives.
prerequisites: Survey of Modern African American Literature

name: African American Fiction
description: This course provides an overview of the major authors, works, and themes in African American fiction.

name: African American Non-Fiction
description: This course examines African American non-fiction literature, focusing on the major authors, works, and themes.
